summary: A couple of dimwitted teens get chased by a killer dressed in a bunny suit.
cast: Cheryl Texiera|Matthew Albrecht|Alaina Gianci|Veronica Wylie|Scott Kuza|Karen Brown Cronin|Andrew Chavez|Joseph Darden|Joshua Lang|Carl Lindbergh|David Scott|Rebecca Scott|Matthew Stiller|Shelby Stingley|Lucia Sullivan|Emerald Brown Cronin|Michael Cronin|Rebecca Grayce|Jennifer Hatley|Rosie Tisch
title: Bunnyman
